content:
I think I'll start by sending her a personalized message on LinkedIn, expressing my admiration for her work and mentioning how we met at the marketing strategies workshop. I'll also mention that I'm interested in exploring potential collaboration opportunities and would love to discuss some ideas with her.

As for collaboration ideas, I think a joint content creation project could be a great starting point. Perhaps we could create a video or blog post series on social media marketing tips, where we share our expertise and experiences. This could help us both reach a wider audience and establish ourselves as thought leaders in our industry.

What do you think? Does that sound like a good starting point?
